attributes.action: Block the planning application for the erection of the Bury and Whitefield Jewish Primary School School on Green Belt land to the West of Old Hall lane in Whitefield (application 50250)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that this school is unnecessary and needs to be blocked as it:

Is on Green Belt land

Is within half a mile of the third most polluted stretch of motorway in the UK

Will adversely affect wildlife

The school proposing the move has seen their attendance haemorrhage by 30% in the last 3 years alone

Will cause additional distress to a badly congested traffic bottleneck

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
